datasetId.title: Source Dataset ID
datasetId.description: The ID or name of the dataset containing items with image URLs to process.

imageUrlFieldName.title: Image URL Field Name
imageUrlFieldName.description: The name of the field in your dataset that contains the direct URL to the image.

lang.title: Tesseract Languages
lang.description: Language codes for Tesseract OCR (e.g., 'eng', 'spa', 'eng+spa'). Use '+' for multiple.

processOnlyClean.title: Process Only Clean Items
processOnlyClean.description: Only process items classified as 'clean' by Apify

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of items to process in each batch. Larger batches are more efficient.

maxWorkers.title: Max Parallel OCR Workers
maxWorkers.description: Number of parallel OCR workers. More workers = faster processing but more memory usage.

downloadChunkSize.title: Download Chunk Size
downloadChunkSize.description: Number of images to download concurrently
